eheth oba sama egodata gos ee yahapath deshaya himi karagannawa atha. 23 oba samage dewiwu swaminwahanse oba sama samanga kalawu unwahansege giwisuma mathaka nathikota obe dewiwu swaminwahanse obata thahanamkara thibena kisiwakata samanawu rupayak sada noganta balaganna. 24 maknisada obe dewiwu swaminwahanse winashakarana ginnak wana, swakiya gaurawaya raksha karannawu dewikenekya. 25 obata daruwanda daruwange daruwanda ipada, oba sama deshayehi boho kalak siti kalhi, oba sama dushyakamkaramin, koyi deyakata numuth samanawu rupayak sadagana, obe dewiwu swaminwahanse udahaswana hatiyata unwahanse idiriye napuruwa thibena deya kaloth, 26 oba sama himikaraganta yordanen etharata yana deshaya mathu pitin oba sama ikmanata sahamulin winashawena bawata ada dawase oba samata wiruddhawa sakshi pinisa ahasatada polowatada handagasami; ehi oba samage dawas wadinowi, oba sama sahamulinma winasha wannahuya. 27 swaminwahanse manushya wargayan atharehi oba sama wisuruwanawa atha, swaminwahanse wisin oba sama pamunuwana jathin atharehi oba sama gananin swalpawa sitinnahuya. 28 ehidi oba sama as penennewath kan asennewath kama kannewath ganda suwanda danennewath naththawu li saha galwalin manushyayange athin saduwawu dewiwarunta mehekaranawa atha. 29 eheth ethana sita oba sama obe dewiwu swaminwahanse soyamin obe mulu sithenda obe mulu aathmayenda soyannahu nam unwahanse obata sambawanaseka. 30 oba pida windina kalada me siyalu de obata pamini kalada anthima dawaswaladi obe dewiwu swaminwahanse desata hari unwahansege handata ahumkandunnoth, 31 obe dewiwu swaminwahanse dayawantha dewikenek bawin unwahanse oba athnoharinaseka, oba winashanokaranaseka, unwahanse obe piyawarun samanga diwulawu giwisuma mathakanathi nokaranaseka. 32 maknisada dewiyan wahanse polowa pita manushyaya mawu dawase patan ahase ek kelawaraka sita anik kelawara dakwa meyakara mahath deyak siddha wunada nohoth meyakara deyak asanta yedunada kiya obata prathama thibunu pasugiya dawaswalin wibhagakaranna. 33 ginna mada sita kathakarana dewiyanwahansege handa oba wisin asuwak men wena yam senangak asa jiwath wunada? 34 nohoth oba samage dewiwu swaminwahanse misarayedi oba samage as idiriyehi oba sama udesa kala siyalla lesa wena yam dewikenek awith parikshanawalinda lakunuwalinda pudumawalinda yuddhayenda balawath hasthayakinda digukala bahuwakinda mahath bhayankarakamwalinda eka jathiyak wena jathiyak madhyayen thamanta ganta haduyeda? 35 ese obata penwanaladde swaminwahansema dewiyanwahanse bawath unwahanse misa wena dewikenek nathi bawath oba danaganna pinisaya. 36 unwahanse obata uganwana pinisa thamanwahansege handa ahasen obata asenta salaswa, polowa pita thamanwahansege mahath ginna obata dakwuseka; unwahansege wachanada ginna madin obata asuneya. 37 unwahanse obe piyawarunta premakala bawin owunta pasuwa owunge wanshaya thoragena, obata wada mahathwu balawathwu jathin oba idiripitin pannadama oba athulata pamunuwa, 38 ada dawase thibennakmen owunge deshaya obata urumayak kota dena pinisa themema prakashawi, swakiya mahath balaya karanakotagena oba misarayen pitathata genaseka. 39 ebawin swaminwahansema ihala swargayehith pahatha polowehith dewiyanwahanse bawada wena dewikenek nathi bawada ada dawase danagena ee bawa obe sithe thaba ganna. 40 obatath oben pasu obe daruwantath shubhasiddhawana pinisada obe dewiwu swaminwahanse sadakalayatama obata dena deshayehi obe dawas wadikaraganna pinisada ada ma wisin obata anakarana unwahansege panath saha aagnya pawathwannayi kiweya. 41 ekala moses pera wairayak nothibi ath waradden thamage asalwasiya marana kenekuta pala yamata, 42 yordanen egoda nagenahira desa nuwarawal thunak wenkeleya; ese kale ohu eyin ekakata palagos jiwathwana pinisaya. 43 ee nuwarawal nam rubenwarunta thanithala rate kantharayehi thibena besherda gadwarunta giliyadhi thibena ramothda manassewarunta bashanhi thibena golanda yana mewaya. 44 moses ishrayel puthrayan idiriyehi thabu wyawasthawa meya. 45 ishrayel puthrayan misarayen aa kala moses yordanen egodadi heshbonhi wasayakalawu amoriwarunge rajawu sihonge deshayehi beth-peyor idiripita thibena mitiyawethdi owunta kiyadun shikshada panathda winishchayawalda mewaya. 46 moses saha ishrayel puthrayo misarayen aa kala sihon rajuta paharadi, 47 arnon oyabada thibena aroyer patan hermon hewath siriyon kanda dakwa yordanen egoda 48 nagenahirata thibena amoriwarunge rajun dedena wana sihonge deshayada bashanhi rajawu oogge deshayada, 49 pisgaye pawulata pahalin thibena araba samabhumiye muhuda dakwa yordanen egoda nagenahirata thibena mulu araba samabhumiyada himikaragaththoya.
